EmailTemplate.name: Event - Accelerate 2015.Email - Update for all Registrants - EN - (webinar forma
EmailTemplate.subject: Tricentis Accelerate 2015 - Program Online Now!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Accelerate - October 22nd, 2015 Novomatic Forum, Vienna 9:00 a.m. – 5:00 p.m. Followed by buffet & networking Hi {{lead.First Name}}, We are delighted that you have registered for Tricentis Accelerate <http://www.tricentis.com/events-webinars/tricentis-accelerate?utm_medium=email&utm_source=sales> on October 22nd, 2015.
The topic of this year's conference is “Testing in the Digital Enterprise Age".
We look forward to your joining us for an inspiring day full of seminars, workshops, and networking. You can find all of the details online in our program <http://www.tricentis.com/events-webinars/tricentis-accelerate/#program>.
Workshop registration will start soon. Keep an eye out for further information!
Don't forget to book your hotel room as soon as possible. We have a block reservation with the following hotels for our participants.
Motel One Wien-Staatsoper Elisabethstraße 5 1010 Wien www.motel-one.com
Hotel Beethoven
Papagenogasse 6 1060 Wien
www.hotel-beethoven.at
Hotel Mercure Secession Getreidemarkt 5 1060 Wien www.accorhotels.com <http://www.accorhotels.com/gb/hotel-3532-hotel-mercure-secession-wien/index.shtml>
See you in Vienna!
Best regards,
The Tricentis Events Team
